mapper.select: SELECT * FROM "TstCaseInTaskComments" o WHERE o."caseId" = #{caseId} AND NOT o.deleted AND NOT o.disabled ORDER BY o."updateTime" DESC LIMIT 15

SELECT o.*, usr.id "userId", usr.nickname "userName", usr.avatar "userAvatar"
FROM "TstCaseInTaskComments" o JOIN "TstUser" usr ON o."userId" = usr.id
WHERE o."caseInTaskId" = #{id} AND NOT o.deleted AND NOT o.disabled
ORDER BY o."updateTime" DESC LIMIT 15
mapper.insert:
insert into "TstCaseInTaskComments" (summary, content, "caseInTaskId", "userId", "createTime", "updateTime", deleted, disabled)
values (#{summary}, #{content}, #{caseInTaskId}, #{userId}, NOW(), NOW(), #{deleted}, #{disabled})
